Summary: PA - suspicious shadow "circle" found on digital pics taken during cold front.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There were no other sightings in Murrysville on or around November 15th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmurrysville, pa - 11\15\08 - i was looking through my digital camera pics trying free up room on my hard drive. i was flipping through a series of pics i took on 11-15-08 around 5 pm during a wild cold front moving through our area, when this "shadow circle" caught my eye between 2 shots of the same "wall" clouds taken 10 seconds apart. other pics reveal "things" upon zoomed inspection in the sky, but they could be discounted as flying debris because of the wind (leaves, branches, etc.). i originally thought it looked only "suspicious", but after seeing similar pics on sites like webcamufo.com that are apparently considered to be ufo-related, i wonder if this one "qualifies". or, perhaps it's only a swirl created by some vortex-type cloud-thing? i have uploaded the original camera files that remain just the way they came out of the camera (canon rebel xti): img_3394.jpg (with shadow) & img_3395jpg (10 seconds later). anyway, the pics are cool.
